Shakhbout City: 
Shakhbout City is located northeast of the Mohammed Bin Zayed City community and south of Abu Dhabi International Airport. The nearby locations to Khalifa City B are Bani Yas and Al Shawamekh, with the upcoming Zayed City to fill the gap between it. The more developed Khalifa City A district is also minutes away. The area is relatively close to Dubai and is connected to the emirate via the Abu Dhabi - Ghweifat International Highway.
IN A NUTSHELL
• Quiet neighborhood located on the outskirts of Abu Dhabi
• Spacious and affordable villas, some with gardens and pools
• Perfect for young couples and families with children
• Good for those regularly commuting to Dubai
• Plenty of schools and educational institutions
• Close to Yas Island and all its exciting events and entertainment options

Maryam Island is the latest addition to Sharjah’s burgeoning tourism sector, and is the first waterfront development destination of its kind in the Emirate.
